p: Caralluma europaea was collected in February 2016, from the Imouzzer region at the Middle Atlas Mountains, Morocco, using GPS coordinates (33°44′ North, 5°01′ West). The plant was authenticated by Professor Bari Amina, and a voucher specimen, 18I4C001, has been deposited in the herbarium of the Department of Biology, Faculty of Sciences Dhar El Mahraz, Fez University.
